Description.Default: This is not a room. This is a location of destiny. Your destiny. Which is to eat a burrito. Go eat a burrito or something.

Eat Burrito.Default: This is not a room. This is a location of destiny. Your destiny. Which is to eat a burrito. You already ate the burrito.

Commands.Look: You see a burrito. It looks delicious.
Commands.Eat: What do you want to eat? Your shoe?

Eat Burrito.Default: It was delicious, and very fattening.
Eat Burrito.Eat: You aren't hungry any more. The burrito was very filling.
Eat Burrito.Eat Burrito: There is no longer a burrito. Sadness follows burritolessness.

Commands.Look: It's a palace. What do you want from me?
